### ggplot2

- `aes()` function is used to map aesthetic (or part / component) of a plot to the underlying data frame of the plot


### tibble

- `tibble`
  + No row names because if you have something you want to use as row names just add it as another column
  + Unlike data frame, a tibble column can contain another tibble
